data.actual_result: They aren't consistent. The ones in Voice and Video subsettings slides smoothly and slowly and the ones  in Notifications silde fast.
data.expected_result: Both of the movements are consistent because they are the same type of buttons.
data.short_description: The select/unselect button/bullet slides in the Voice and Video subsettings but just moves in the notifications subsettings.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Settings> Notifications. - Click on any of the options. - Observe how it moves. - Now open Settings> Voice and Video. - Click on any of the slideable buttons. - Observe how it goes.
